content.name: p
children: Quorum 是一个给去中心化应用提供存储的基础设施。

content.name: p
children: 作为用户，您可以运行 Quorum 节点来存储数据，从而 100% 地掌握你自己的数据。

content.name: p
children: 作为开发者，您可以基于 Quorum 打造一个去中心化的应用程序。

content.name: p
children: 那么，我们如何往 Quorum 节点上面存储数据呢？

children.name: Fence
Fence
children:
"""
pip install -U quorum-lightnode eth-keys
"""
import secrets

import eth_keys
from lightnode import LightNode
from lightnode.utils import pretty_print

lightnode = LightNode("/tmp/lightnode")
group_id = "group uuid4 id"
private_key = eth_keys.keys.PrivateKey(secrets.token_bytes(32)).to_bytes()

def send_trx():
    obj = {
        "type": "Create",
        "object": {
            "type": "Note",
            "id": "1",
            "content": "hello world",
        },
    }
    pretty_print(lightnode.post_to_group(group_id, private_key, obj))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    send_trx()
